page.title: 19JOB SCENE.
page.content: {Shropshire County Council}employs more people in the Shrewsbury area than any other employer.Teachers,administrators ,parks attendants and maintainence men are but a few of those employed. Manufacturing in the town is dominated by{Perkins}engine builders and {Shrewsbury Tool and Die.}Numbers employed in manufacturing vary throughout the year according to the orders placed with each company. {Unemployment}in the area is well below the national average at 12%.To assist those out of work the{Job Centre}in the{Square}is open five days a week. Each day they receive twenty to thirty descriptions of job vacancies of which they are proud of filling 75%.Despite this success the unemployment figures remain stable due to the fact that most jobs are seasonal and part time.
